data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 3,481 believers in Cuenca to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cuenca, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Cuenca.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 213,919 lost in Cuenca that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Cuenca to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please defend the 3,481 believers in Cuenca against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Cuenca, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Cuenca words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
